markdownRemark.html:
Photonic Workshop, CCMS, National Taiwan University, JUL 2021 - MAR 2022

This project was awarded the Technology Innovation Award by CCMS, National Taiwan University and the College Student Research Creativity Award by National Science and Technology Coucil.

In this research program, with support from my mentor Yu Ming Chang at CCMS, NTU and the Ministry of Science and Technology, I developed a microscopic hyperspectal imaging system using LabVIEW and various optics engineering skills.

Refer to these Github repos and this document for more detail. Also, this thoroughly documented the development of the system integration LabVIEW software.

Relevent skill

  • software development
  • optical engineering
  • LabVIEW
  • system integration

frontmatter.title: College Student Researcher
frontmatter.subtitle: Photonic Workshop, CCMS, National Taiwan University
frontmatter.meta_description: Development of a novel line-scan hyperspectral imaging system with LabVIEW. Recieved the Excellance Awards (NT20,000) at 2021 CCMS Innovative Techniques Competition.
